result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heidi M Rose

records.addlTxt: JSS Social Worker re: update on def

State by Ruud /  Def in custody of LCJ by video
State:  Def has new case (22CM800) for retail theft & BJ which allegedly occurred on Thurs.
CRT:  I did a 48-hr review
State:  I rec'd Notice from Atty Rhodes that he had another appt., but thought he would be able to log in by zoom
CRT:  release plan filed on 10-28-2022
State:  it was sent to both myself & Atty Rhodes
CRT:  I set bond for cash in amount of $2500 for new arrest (22CM800)
State;  no issue w/ Ms Rose being released if she goes directly to LE Phellips.  She does have a ed at a treatment facility once she is done @ LE Phillips.  There is concern, she needs a treatment plan when she is back out in community
CRT:  it is my understanding that she does not want to avail herself of treatment
Def:  I told JSS I would comply w/ plan.  I was supposed to go to LE Phellips on Thurs night but I was arrested in the afternoon.  Rob will take me
CRT:  ONCE A BED IS AVAILABLE I WILL CONVERT THE CASH BOND IN 22CM800 TO A $2500 SIGNATURE BOND - Conditions:  Remain @ LE Phillips until properly discharged.  Complete treatment @ Arbor House or similar facility.  Do follow-up trmt w/ a treatment plan.  If def leaves before successfully completing treatment programs, bond will be converted back to $2500 cash bond
Def comments on IOP
CRT comments that a release plan from Arbor Place should be prepared & followed
CRT:  INITIAL APP SET FOR 11-17-2022 @ 2 pm (22CM800)
CRT:  work w/ JSS to contact placement facilities
CRT:  once a bed is verified, Rob can come & pick def up
